features: 🎮HUNDREDS OF GAMES: This game console contains 400+ classic video games.Including many classic games from the last century, more than 400 completely different video games allow you to participate throughout the day to make up for your childhood regrets. Multiple video game types, such as action, puzzle, sports, fighting and racing.

🎮SUPPORT FOR 2 PLAYERS &SUPPORTS TV CONNECTION:You can connect retro handheld game console with 2.4-inch screen to the TV, through safe and non-toxic ABS plastic game handle and 118 inch AV data cable, so you can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen. Note: The game signal can only be selected between the game console and the TV! Enjoy Your family entertainment time.

🎮RECHARGEABLE BATTERY:Built-in 350mAh large capacity lithium battery can be charged, which supports up to 2-3 hours game playing time after being fully charged. You can play it outside without plugging in. So you don’t need to worry about running out of power outside, More comfortable gaming experience!

🎮EASY TO CARRY: Compact and lightweight with slim body, you can put it in your pocket or bag, and carry it with you on the way to work, free time, the best choice for relaxing yourselves. Play anytime and anywhere, enjoy the fun of train, airplane, camp, or travel!

🎮BEST GIFT : The retro handheld game console not only bringing funny game time to children but also waking up wonderful childhood memories to the 80s and 90s adults, as well as releasing their life pressure.It is the perfect gift choice for Birthday Christmas and New year festival moments.
body.description: 👍Bring you happy childhood memories：You can play many retro games. For example: action games, shooting games, sports games, fighting games, racing games, puzzle game.It some games repeat.👍High-resolution screen：It features a colorful LCD screen and supports AV output, not only giving you a high-quality picture and gaming experience, but also making you more stress-free and make you feel better. Meanwhile, you could bring it everywhere with slim design.👍Easy to Operate:The game console has a classic button game controller. The classic design is easy to start. You can start your childhood journey by pressing the button. Become the winner of classic games and enjoy endless fun. People's happiness is so easy.📦Package Included:1* Host and Classic controllers1* AV cable1*Charger and charging cable1* user manual❤️ Note:-Our doubles nostalgic game console has been tested. reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun!!
reviews.reviewText: If you're in to retro games, then get this!! This is the perfect game system for young and old. I played it as a handheld device, but the graphics are better when you plug it into the TV and play.
